Text: MONDALE: I want to thank the League of Women Voters, the good citizens of Kansas City, and President Reagan for agreeing to debate this evening.
Speech: I want to thank the League of Women Voters, the good citizens of Kansas City, and President Reagan for agreeing to debate this evening.

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Text: This evening we talked about national strength.
Speech: This evening we talked about national strength.
Speaker: MONDALE
Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Speech: But I think strength must also require wisdom and smarts in its exercise.

Speech: That's key to the strength of our nation.

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Text: That's why I want to get these debts down and these interest rates down, restore America's exports, help rural America, which is suffering so much, and bring the jobs back here for our children.

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Text: I want this next generation to be the best educated in American history, to invest in the human mind and science again, so we're out front.

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale

Name: Walter F. Mondale
